Package util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ARFFJoiner
    Joins a directory of ARFF files into a single ARFF file.
    ArrayBHPercGetter
    A utility script that parses a file where each row contains neighbor occurrence frequencies of data points, first the total, then the bad, then the good.
    ArrayBucketer
    A utility class that counts the number of occurrences of a quantity in each bucket, where the size of a bucket is given as an input parameter.
    ArrayUtil
    A utility class for working with arrays of measurements.
    AuxSort
    This class implements utility sorting methods.
    BasicMathUtil
    Some basic math utility methods.
    CommandLineParser
    This class handles entering command line parameters.
    DataSetJoiner
    A utility class that joins several DataSet instances into one.
    DataSortUtil
    A utility class for sorting DataInstance objects.
    DirectoryAnalogizer
    A utility class that makes sure that one directory has analogous files to a reference directory.
    FileCounter
    A utility class for traversing the directory structure, counting files and fetching all relative paths of files in directories and subdirectories.
    FileNameLister
    A utility class that fetches all relative paths of a given extension to a given top directory, recursively, as well as a list of file names.
    HTTPUtil
    A utility class for some simple HTTP requests.
    ImageUtil
    A utility class for image files.
    LogUtil
    Utility class for logs to existing files.
    NonHomogenityCalculator
    Calculates the non-homogeneity of an array of values.
    NumberStringUtil
    Utility class for formatting numbers for printout.
    ReaderToStringUtil
    This class implements a method that takes a reader and converts its contents into a single String.
    SneakPeek
    A utility class for having a peek into a big file.
    SOPLUtil
    A utility class that contains methods for printing our data arrays.
